content:
The chunk is a list of particle emitter types within the "Particle Emitters" document, describing each emitter's unique parameters and the effect of their custom mode. This section follows an introduction to particle emitters, their modes (explicit, radiate, custom), and common parameters.

The following list contains the different types of emitters, their unique parameters, and the effect of the custom mode.

BoxEmitter

Variable Definition Values minBound Minimum point for box volume (x, y, z) maxBound Maximum point for box volume (x, y, z)

Custom mode generates particles with no initial velocity.

DiscEmitter

Variable Definition Values radius Radius of disc [0, infinity) outerAngle Particle launch angle at edge of disc [0, 360] innterAngle Particle launch angle at center of disc [0, 360] outerMagnitude Launch velocity multiplier at edge of disc (-infinity, infinity) innerMagnitude Launch velocity multiplier at center of disc (-infinity, infinity) cubicLerping Whether or not magnitude/angle interpolation is cubic Boolean

Custom mode uses the last five parameters. Particles emitted from areas on the inside use interpolated magnitudes and angles, either liner or cubic.

PointEmitter

Variable Definition Values location Location of outer point (x, y, z)
